lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can and I have an obligation to do so. Doing well by doing good.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the consumer and small business banking functions at a large bank.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: because I'm a helper and I like to see how a small, simple gestures can produce big ripples of change.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It's a simple way to make a real difference in the lives of those who are in need of financial resources to help build their businesses and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I provide investment, retirement, tax, estate planning and other personal financial planning advice to my clients.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I believe I can help to eradicate global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 13 to 18 who have special needs. They are emotionally and behaviorally handicapped. I love my work.

lender.name: Lachlan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themself

lender.name: Austin-Ethan-Madeline
lender.loan_because: We have run our business and know it\'s hard work. We want to help people in other countries succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in Texas. To make money, we used to run a lemonaid and cookie stand on our block.

lender.name: chrislovescara
lender.loan_because: i want to help.

lender.name: David Millar
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity for success.

lender.name: Mr. Bridges
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to give back to our world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people in the United States about poverty, inequality, and development.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I have traveled in the world and seen poverty up close, and I want to make a more direct impact in my giving.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: when I am having a bad day it makes me feel better about everything.
lender.occupational_info: The world really is a good place.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I fight fires and rescue people

lender.name: Jeffrey & Natalie
lender.loan_because: Make loans, not war!

lender.name: CJ Fonzi
lender.loan_because: I am committed to international development through entrepreneurship at the base of the economic pyramid. Economically sustainable and locally borne business, built from the bottom up, are the answer to poverty alleviation. Empowering people to help themselves will drive change beyond the wildest dreams of government.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for the Global Impact Investing Network. I'm a manager on our Impact Reporting and Investing Standards team. We're working on a series of common standards for reporting social impact. This is a piece of infrastructure that has been identified by Monitor consulting and the Rockefeller as critical to attracting more capital to the Impact Investing space.
Before taking this role I served as the manager for Monitoring and Evaluation for the Clinton Foundation in India.
Previously I had worked in India attempting to get a "Base of the Pyramid" business off the ground in the slums of Hyderabad and nearby villages. The project was a partnership between Cornell University and DuDpont.

lender.name: The Brashear Family
lender.loan_because: We are very thankful for what we have and want to help others around the world.

lender.name: Jeff Barson
lender.loan_because:
I think it's better to give a fishing pole than a fish.
http://freelancemd.com http://medicalspamd.com http://frontdeskseo.com http://printmd.net
lender.occupational_info: I try to take ideas and turn them into businesses.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help others

lender.name: George,Beth&Cybelle
lender.loan_because: Giving is a good thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: George: Communications integrator for an Inupiat Native Corp. Beth: Counselor for a Woman's Clinic.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance at succeeding in life and at being self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Helping raise my children to be aware of the world around them by teaching them that to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Teri
lender.loan_because: it takes a special person to be an entrepreneur. Having the will is half the battle. If I can supply the resources, I\'m helping empower someone I\'ve never met to do something incredible.
lender.occupational_info: Sell medical devices to surgeons and support them in the operating room.

lender.name: Golden Temple ERP Team
lender.loan_because: Our friends, Steady Improvement, provided a holiday gift of a Kiva account to our ERP Project team. We are excited to help provide funds to help people change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We Produce Yogi Teas and Peace Cereals in Eugene Oregon and were a team of 8 employees on a project to implement an Oracle ERP system. Working together we continue to re-loan as repayments are made.

lender.name: Queen A Middle School
lender.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. It takes so little to make such a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse. I have traveled to developing countries and I have seen the daily struggles of others. KIVA is a great way to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Matthew, Frieda & Emmott
lender.occupation: Human Rights Worker - Local Church Pastor
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of helping people with tools to transform their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a human rights group called Love146 (www.love146.org) and Pastor Terra Nova Church in Troy, NY (www.terranovachurch.org) Frieda is a Pharmacist ... Emmott is a full time baby.

lender.name: Lia
lender.loan_because: In my life I have received much help and support along the way. Kiva offers me a way to help others to help themselves, so, that they in turn can also help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help teachers and students learn how to use new technology.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: My name\'s Tim, I help people.
lender.occupational_info: I might be the world\'s best hand stand artist over the age of fifty.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I have been helped in my life and this is one way I can repay for the assistance I have been given.

lender.name: AccuTran Global
lender.loan_because: This is the coolest idea ever - I love that we can invest in others as a group. We\'re creating a pool, including kids, who can invest together and build a portfolio. Timba the dog is our mascot.
lender.occupational_info: We are an online transcription company - anyone can work for us anywhere in the world if they have good English, good listening, can type, and have Internet access.

lender.name: Cris B
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have good people in my life, ready to help me when I was in need. Thanks to them, I can now return the favor.

lender.name: Believer
lender.loan_because: I think micro-lending is a wonderful way to help people around the world. When I am repaid--the same money can be used to help others. What a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: My library loans books to children and adults so they can learn and enjoy. I help them use computers, too.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Why not?
lender.occupational_info: I study grammar and punctuation.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: To help other entrepreneurs get their business started!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer software industry. I also help aid South Africa with food.

lender.name: anthony
lender.loan_because: "Others dream of things that never were, and ask why not?"
lender.occupational_info: service above self

lender.name: Cullen
lender.loan_because: Being able to get a loan like this is a good thing. I am an entrepreneur myself, so I understand the value of getting some capital to make the business perform the way it could. It is also my belief that by helping others, my business benefits.
lender.occupational_info: 1) I sell computer software that helps people map things out and analyze their information based on location. 2) I pursue various projects based on interest and viability 3) I own my house, and have one apartment and one office in the building that are rentals.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I just want to help someone if I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Condo Developer.

lender.name: J..
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: My company makes tests to quickly diagnose diseases anywhere - from the middle of the desert to the middle of a city.

lender.name: Lothar Fritsch
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to reach out and provide help and support in a meaningful way
lender.occupational_info: My company, MtS Consulting, provides market research and intelligence services to large corporations that help them better understand what matters to consumers and small business owners around the world.

lender.name: Deren
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people get started on the road to self-sufficiency, rather than simple charity!

lender.name: Angus
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am able to. I have shelter, food, clothing, health care, education, a job, and financial resources. Our lives are short - we have only so much time to make a real difference in the lives of others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am the General Manager of Wigwamen Incorporated, the oldest and largest Aboriginal non-profit housing corporation in Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I did a summer internship in Bolivia. Daily my heart was broken by what I saw: a woman with her feverish infant in her arms, a mother feeding her four children off leftovers left on tables by careless tourists, children with no parents singing on street corners for money. When I returned to the US I had a new appreciation for what I had so readily available to me and vowed to do anything I could to help those who didn't have that.
lender.occupational_info: I study the earth. I look at layers of dirt and try to understand what the earth was like when they were laid down.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Yo amo Honduras.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: Direct from farm-to-restaurant local food distribution company. Our aim is for chefs to meet and develop authentic relationships with local farmers, for farmers to receive a fair price for their products, and for the food that makes it to plate is fresh, healthy, grown in a sustainable way and makes as small an ecological footprint as possible.

lender.name: Aaron and Kira
lender.loan_because: It is important to foster sustainable businesses all over the world to help reduce global poverty.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: there is great inequality of wealth and access to opportunity in this world. It is critical to peace and mutual understanding that those in a position to help those who are in a position to help themselves and their communities do so, now more than ever.
lender.occupational_info: I promote savings and investing accounts on the Internet.

lender.name: Joan & Jim
lender.loan_because: We feel that helping people to find satisfying and productive work is the way we will see economic and social equality in the world. People who can pay back loans and can make a living will help others to find the same satisfaction.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be qualified to guide people with their choice of foods to improve or maintain their health and to be able to reduce their reliance on pharmaceuticals.\r\n\r\nJim builds beautiful one-of-a-kind furniture and cabinetry and works on boats, repair and enhancement, when he gets an opportunity.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: A small difference to me makes a large difference to others who are willing to work hard to achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Motivate and teach people in the art of selling.

lender.name: Stephen and Lindsay
lender.loan_because: We have the ability to help and we believe we have a responsibility to give back to our global community. We don\'t see borders but only other human beings who like us, aspire to create a good life for their families wherever they choose to call home.
lender.occupational_info:
Lindsay and I are both involved in business and creativity. Lindsay is a photographer who enjoys capturing the essence of people and landscapes in their candid or natural state.
Stephen is a new media producer managing creative teams who produced motion graphic content for digital media networks.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: This is such a great opportunity to make a positive difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Abraham
lender.loan_because: Those who have, should help those in need. People helping people, it's a beautiful thing.
lender.occupational_info: I design at Kiva.org

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Uttara
lender.loan_because: giving can make the world a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3-5 year old preschool children. some of them have special needs. I enjoy working with all kind of children.They bring lot of happiness to me.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: The world is connected today in ways that never existed before. Kiva makes it possible for those relationships to become concrete, real, and meaningful I am deeply grateful for this small opportunity for greater understanding.

lender.name: Hirsch Family
lender.loan_because: We live in a global community and I believe we each have a responsiblity to encourage and enchance the lives of not only those surrounding us, but of all that we can reach.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: it\'s a great christmas gift!
lender.occupational_info: I make it easier for people to sell things for other people.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I love the whole concept of micro-economics and the feeling of being a direct participant. I like the recycling aspect of my loans -- I've just made my first loan with money that has been repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Planned Parenthood, a women's reproductive health organization. I maintain the databases for our donors, volunteers and advocates, create and launch many of our email messaging and advocacy campaigns, and also participate in the daily work of the fundraising, volunteer, and community affairs departments.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I believe in a kinder world and empowering those who show initiative
lender.occupational_info: mostly office deal with brokers who ask for quotes to get insurance for businesses

lender.name: YVONNE
lender.loan_because: My mission is to help women be self sufficient. This grass roots opportunity is what I was looking for.
lender.occupational_info: I help new home purchasers choose upgrades and finishes for thier new home.

lender.name: Bert and Dara
lender.occupational_info: Bert works in a hospital, using instruments and microscopes to analyze blood. Dara helps people prepare for graduate school.

lender.name: Sook
lender.loan_because: I wish to make a tiny difference in the lives of people who are determined to help themselves.

lender.name: Gontran & Rosi
lender.loan_because: I worked in Africa. I know how important these loans are. It is the best way to help and make a difference in someone\'s life. We are sharing the same planet, to offer assistance, is what I think we should do.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in the radio environment on the technical side. Now that I am retired from that area, I am still working, but in a new field. My work consists of buying old heritage houses, restoring them, so they have a new life.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of micro-loans and would like to make a difference for somebody that doesn't have the access to loans.
lender.occupational_info: I study eye diseases by helping analyze data in clinical trials and other medical studies.

lender.name: Gobind
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to be able to do so and it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: When we help our fellow human beings, we all benefit-helping to create a more prosperous, peaceful world.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to run a business and I know how sometimes such a little bit can go such a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am the president of a computer consulting business that has been in operation since 1986.

lender.name: Murillo-Fuller
lender.loan_because: we should all take care of each other, locally and globally.
lender.occupational_info: We love how Kiva connects us to the world.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: My mother's family came over from Lithuania in 1944. They were given much assistance along their path to freedom, and this is a small way that I can return the favor.

lender.name: Dowell Family
lender.loan_because: We were given a gift to pass on to others by a lovely little girl...thanks, Emma.

lender.name: Jim & Sandy
lender.loan_because: It is important to share among family - and in this day and age, the world is small and the family large.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office building, downtown in a city of a million people. My work involves looking after the finances of a company engaged in waste management, recycling, and recovery of industrial wastes.

lender.name: Ruth (& Marisa)
lender.loan_because: It is an extension of the work I do and my passion - helping people develop their potential and be successful. I want to teach my daughter about giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university providing academic support for students. I used to be a career counsellor and saw the support that Canada gives to unemployed people, including those trying to start their own businesses. Kiva helps in countries that don't offer this advantage to their citizens.

lender.name: sweet pea
lender.loan_because: we are all family.
lender.occupational_info: I create educational material.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: Lending to these small businesses does more than offer dollars, the loans offer hope.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I have been a small business owner in the past, and understand how difficult obtaining capital can be. I am in a position to help others now, and want to do so. This program and its possibilities excites me very much.
lender.occupational_info: I manage renovation construction projects for a multi national coffee retailer.

lender.name: morag
lender.loan_because: This is a person who needs our help.
lender.occupational_info: My family is blessed to be able to help.

lender.name: Pat & Tony
lender.loan_because: Kiva helps connect us to the rest of the world in a positve manner; we care!

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: A mystery solver for all those little pieces of rock and metal we wear as symbols.

lender.name: Jim and Kathy
lender.loan_because: We hope to help someone that wants to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: We are retired farmers. We used to raise honey bees and organically grown chickens.

lender.name: Nathan & Sarah
lender.loan_because: I know we have a huge house here in the states and lots of savings and its time we made a little bit of difference for those who have less.
lender.occupational_info: Mom stays home with kids. Dad goes to an office at a school to help teachers keep their classrooms running.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It is doing something tangible in developing countries and not giving money that disappears into the ether.

lender.name: Joelle
lender.loan_because: I loan to fellow people to support their dreams and business goals, as they would loan to us if our situations in life were reversed.
lender.occupational_info: Health care and entrepreneur

lender.name: Kenneth & Margaret
lender.loan_because: To provide opportunities to people who do not have the advantages I do and to promote the image of our country across the world.
lender.occupational_info: Aerospace systems engineer & college registrar / student accounts lead

lender.name: Mimi
lender.loan_because: Es ist nett unsre Nachbarn zu helfen.
lender.occupational_info: Just breathe...

lender.name: Markos
lender.loan_because: worthwhile effort to assist other people
lender.occupational_info: teacher of science

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Every person in the World does not have it as well as most of the United States and other industrialized countries. Over 1.5 Billion live on less than $1 a day. And what is worse is that because of problems with poverty many people die unnecessarily. Children suffering in poverty die at a rate of one every 3.3 seconds.\r\n\r\nI feel that with Kiva, these loans make it possible for these persons to help make a living for themselves and their families. It is not simply a donation that will create "one meal".

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: it makes sense

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and want to share
lender.occupational_info: A teacher is a teacher in any land

lender.name: theorchardoxford
lender.loan_because: It may just bring one family out of poverty.

lender.name: Cyrus
lender.loan_because: I aspire that individuals everywhere lead fulfilled lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed at a biotechnology company in Minneapolis, Minnesota. As a scientist I play my small role in designing tools for medical research and diagnostic purposes.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people, but am disillusioned with ordinary charity and taxes.

I once read that while we may earn our money in the immediate sense, the circumstances that we were born into and are privileged to enjoy also 'earn' that money for us. I can imagine few things in my life that I could have 'earned' with hard work if I lived in a village where, as Achewood put it, the economy is based on my brother riding a bicycle with no tires past a broken crate.

I hope that all my actions create good in the world, and lessen the bad. I am trying to focus my life through that lens.
lender.occupational_info: I'm trying to start a new kind of non-profit. The aim is to raise 1 million within two years.

lender.name: Richard and Erinn
lender.loan_because: There is joy in the act of giving and we are obligated to help those less fortunate.

lender.name: The Babin Family
lender.loan_because: it\'s the right thing to do and we are so happy to be able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Husband works in a mine and wife is an office worker.

lender.name: Doug and Angela
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: Cold

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is great. Because I can. Because its crazy to let the bank to hang on to my money "just in case I need it" when folks need it now. Because I believe in bringing about change myself instead of asking others to do it for me (by voting etc.). Because I'm still an idealist (on a good day).
lender.occupational_info: I'm a junior doctor in Derby, UK.

lender.name: Nazanin
lender.loan_because: There are no little events in life. Those we think of no consequence might be full of fate.

lender.name: Karim
lender.loan_because: No money, no bussiness.
lender.occupational_info: I am a technician.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an easy way to make a big difference in a world that's getting smaller every day.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: Because we believe that a little help goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I rent apartments to people.

lender.name: Greg & Laura
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to use the gifts God has given me to help others.

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Funding and helping entrepreneurial spirits of all kinds.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help other people in the world without spending tons of money that you don't have.
lender.occupational_info: I do research in forest health and statistics

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I believe I am a Citizen of this World not just an American. I believe in kindness and lending a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that implements computers and software that make them run. As a Project Manager I ensure that we meet our commitments to our customers with our implementations. This includes the money that it will cost the customer, how long it will take and the success that it will bring.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help students to be able to see what is going on around them. I do not challenge them to be interested in what I am interested, just to be interested in something.

lender.name: Leslie & Gerry
lender.loan_because: A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing the wealth.

lender.name: Khaled
lender.loan_because: I love to help people to make this world a better place
lender.occupational_info: Manager in Computer Industry

lender.name: Marco, Jamie and Cassidy
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and I am teaching my daughter about the right use of capital.
lender.occupational_info: Healing

lender.name: Kim, June & family
lender.loan_because: We have a good life in Canada. We see how difficult it is in other countries, and how little it takes to improve the lives people who want to help themselves. Myself and my family can make a difference in the lives of these people. Kiva is an excellent organization to facilitate that opportunity.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because:
I love this idea

Little bureaucracy and real dollars going to real people 
I think this is a great way to help not only individuals but also communities. I am greatful that I can assist is some way.
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who are at risk of isolation as a result of social and economic issues.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Christmas is coming and this seemed a much better idea than giving my family socks again.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer for a business newspaper in Seattle, Washington, USA.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Kiva is inspiring.

lender.name: Piero Colonna
lender.loan_because: I believe it is one of the effective ways of improving the lives of less fortunate people
lender.occupational_info: I teach energy engineering and I do research on sustainable energy systems

lender.name: Andrew L
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we need a boost to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I reside very near Houston, Texas. I have a turf and tree/shrub care business. I apply chemicals, nutrients, ect., to keep them all healthy and free from pests.

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: i want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: i am earning my graduate degree in social work.

lender.name: ELIZABETH
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I'm in the position of being fortunate to be born in the land of plenty

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I think it provides a great opportunity for individuals to help themselves. I especially like supporting women who are the sole providers for their families.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Mark & Ann
lender.loan_because: We are happy to help others start a business.

lender.name: Lorraine
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the right to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: You begin saving the world by saving one soul at a time; all else is grandiose romanticism or politics.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: This Is Not Giving Charity.It's Helping People Who Want A Better Life And Are Willing To Work For It.

lender.name: christopher
lender.loan_because: Best way for someone like me to help
lender.occupational_info: I attend Reed College

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I care about others and want everyone to have the opportunity to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work on climate change issues for the U.S. Forest Service.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to do so, and would like to make the world a more decent place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach High School seniors in a middle class suburb of NY City.

lender.name: Mary Peyton
lender.loan_because: I've been part of a struggling small business and I know how much a loan can help!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have been a lucky person in life, and I want to share it.
lender.occupational_info: I produce radio stories on the arts and sciences.

lender.name: Stan
lender.loan_because: I see my participation as a partnership between myself as an ordinary person with other ordinary people. I have a little extra money and through Kiva, I can find partners who can put my money to work.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I wish someone would loan to me.

lender.name: Dalala
lender.loan_because: I have experienced small contributions made at the right time help myself and my family in amazing ways. This is an opportunity to give back the support people I have never meant in the same way.
lender.occupational_info: I work at home in a little office nestled in the woods on an island. I design and maintain websites, mainly for artists or sites devoted to local tourism.

lender.name: Greg in Cincinnati
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I sell computers for IBM

lender.name: Sarah and Keith
lender.loan_because: we like to "meet" new people.
lender.occupational_info: Sarah looks at skin in the microscope. Keith builds houses.

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: A small loan from me can help people. It doesn't even cost me anything, although I will probably reinvest everything that is paid back into the next loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large multinational company on computer systems.

lender.name: Laurin
lender.loan_because: Money + work can create wealth.

lender.name: Rosalba
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to be able to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My work is just like any chemistry class lab! It's fun and it allows me to have much needed extra money.

lender.name: sara
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I make and teach art.

lender.name: Raul
lender.loan_because: I enjoy participating in the pursuit of a dream.
lender.occupational_info: The projects I work on require that I look for investors to fund my ideas. I understand how difficult it can be to raise money and to get an idea off the ground. And how satisfying it is when you succeed.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner myself, I realize the dreams, needs, and aspirations these deserving people have. How this program will change their lives gives me the biggest lump in my throat! God bless them all...
lender.occupational_info: I photograph weddings, families, pets, etc.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help with the revitalization of Eastern Europe.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves assisting very large companies in choosing technology to manage their technology investments.

lender.name: Filippo
lender.loan_because: I think money are the best way to react at the limited time that life gives us.
lender.occupational_info: I am software architect. I work for a little company named Espedia. I develope software integrations between CAD systems and SAP using Visual Studio .NET.

lender.name: Kate and Ross
lender.loan_because: We enjoyed our first round of loans, and have continued. Giving a little bit in a few places to help give a few people a chance at improving their quality of life is rewarding and positive.
lender.occupational_info: We work for technology companies that make things that make our modern world go \'round.

lender.name: Tom V
lender.loan_because: Cool way to have a positive impact in specific peoples lives, whom I would otherwise never have a chance to help change like this.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for the effort of KIVA which allows people from all over the world to partner in very intentional and specific ways. Thanks for allowing us to be a part of this massive movement around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the world of technology helping to sell computers for a company called Apple.

lender.name: WSBC Manager group
lender.occupational_info: We work to prevent workplace injuries and we provide compensation and rehabilitation for people who are injured while working

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea! I was particularily moved by a business woman from Africa who said that she didn\'t want charity - and that receiving and repaying a loan gave her a great sense of dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who owns a small law firm that primarily represents employees who have been wrongfully dismissed from their workplace.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing!

lender.name: Bob, Laurie & Charlotte
lender.loan_because: we give a little, they get a lot.
lender.occupational_info: We live in Stow, MA, USA. Bob works for a dot.com and Laurie is a stay at home mom taking care of our wonderful baby Charlotte

lender.name: Larp
lender.loan_because:
My brother is such a great example (and he will like this gift better than more "stuff").
< < < < < < < < < .... That's him.
Happy Christmas, 2006!
. . . Update, 2008: Look, Larp! . . . These new loans are to people who . . . are even older than we are! . . . Happy Birthday
* * * and more... December, 2010 This is truly the gift that keeps on giving. Peace on Earth; Good Will To All
* * * and again: Christmas, 2011: * * * Supporting Landlords Around The Globe * * * Joy To The World!

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to see people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Canadian Oil & Gas Company and act as a liaison with Indigenous people to ensure proper consultation and mitigation measures take place prior to any company impact on the land.

lender.name: george and lynda
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed. We lend because we can.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.occupational_info: student, writing on my final tesis about fair trade

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: i try to change something
lender.occupational_info: working hard on very different areas: etics, business, photgraphy, media

lender.name: Golby Family
lender.loan_because: We were introduced to KIVA through a public television show highlighting the organization and thought it would be a great family experience as well as do some good during the holiday season. We hope to do more in the future.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My dad thought it would be a good Christmas gift and I agree. This has been a wonderful organization to be involved in.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a community rape crisis center.

lender.name: BunchODudes
lender.loan_because: We care too.
lender.occupational_info: Lets see:Paul- Rookie police officer, chases bad guys. Special power- Hairdo and Forearms of Doom. LouDogg- Pro park ranger, chases squirrels. Special power- Whirling arm and leg defense. Davin- Pro painting services, paints houses. Special power- Uncontrollable anger! Clipp- Pro supervisor/undiscovered snowboarder. Special power- Snowboard tricks and voice imitations. Victor- social services, seeks justice and truth for all living things utilizing questionable means. Special power- Mind tricks (will eventually turn into a bad guy). Christina- finance, works too much. Special power- Imitates dance moves to subdue Victor's powers. Jose- engineer, likes big calculators. Special power- Big calculator.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in a world community.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I'm passionate about giving something back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: Writer

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Lending supports the goals of small business people around the world and helps to build prosperity in their communities
lender.occupational_info: I work with small businesses helping them grow

lender.name: Jolynn
lender.loan_because: I have so much . I feel extremely lucky to live where I do and have so many opportunities. I want my son and his girlfriend to realize how much they also have, and so have given Kiva gift certificates to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large corporation, helping to maintain the business corporate records for over 100 of their subsidiary companies.

lender.name: ALEXANDER/RILEY
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world and this small gift will start us on the right path.
lender.occupational_info: We like to play and have fun.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Capitalism, it's a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the auto industry during the day and am a super-hero/family-man at night...play a bit of guitar/bass, too!

lender.name: Andy and Maria
lender.loan_because: People need opportunities in a world that imposes far too many obstacles on them and their families. While our loans may be small, the cummulative effect of all the loans made to an individual has the power to change their lives forever. KIVA IS DOING GREAT WORK, SO CAN YOU!

lender.name: Paul in Seattle
lender.loan_because: I feel privileged to have traveled to many of the places that Kiva loans support, and have been inspired by the happiness and friendliness of people who live on their hard work and dedication to their families and communities.

lender.name: Jason and Diana
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: We purchaes and sell real estate, property management

lender.name: Adene
lender.occupation: I work in non-profit and co-op housing
lender.loan_because: It seems beneficial to all.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: I believe that the world can be positively affected by being involved in the global community.

lender.name: Maxwell
lender.loan_because: I have been impressed with the independent business people I have come across in my travels.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a shop that sells CDs and t-shirts. I make psychedelic paintings and I LOVE TO TRAVEL!

lender.name: Firebase Z Intel Group
lender.loan_because: To help others, help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
FIREBASE Z INTEL GROUP CA PI Lic # 26731 PO Box 233, Lytle Creek, CA 92358 firebasez@aol.com (909) 638-1097
"For your safety and peace of mind"

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can\'t afford not to.
lender.occupational_info: Assist innocent & injured people against rich, ruthless & oppresive corporations.

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by opportunity and have been taught how to work hard. I would like to give opportunities to others who are obviously working hard.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a physician to keep children healthy and I teach my children at home to keep them happy and challenged.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I used to own a small business in Canada. That experience taught me to appreciate the difficulty in getting support for small projects. Now KIVA provides this opportunity to lend to others - based on trust. What a Fantastic concept and proof of simple humanity all over the planet.

lender.name: Gigi
lender.loan_because: I think we are all world citizens and ending poverty is basic to a peacful existence.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I was born into a country with tremendous resources and freedoms. Although I\\\'m grateful for this, it comes with a sobering responsibility to share with others who can teach me what it means to persevere.

lender.name: Bib&Fam
lender.loan_because: I can (and to teach my children how easy it is to make a difference).

lender.name: Jahn
lender.loan_because: ...of a basic philosophy in life ... give a \"man\" a fish, he eats for a day ... teach a \"man\" to fish, he eats for a lifetime. Better to loan people money to improve their lot in life, versus just handing them money that could very well be spent in short order.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to invest for their particular goals in life (example: saving for retirement, saving for future college expenses, etc.), while taking into account their risk tolerance.

lender.name: Sidney
lender.loan_because: I made this loan on my mother\'s behalf as a Christmas present to her, to honor her generous spirit and her wish for world peace.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I like to see someone who is dedicated\r\nreceive a helping hand.

lender.name: jack
lender.occupational_info: I manage the news content on a newspaper Web site (www.knoxnews.com).

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I love to see people working hard to make a better life for themselves. I want some of my money to help someone else get a needed loan!
lender.occupational_info: I am an RF Engineer working for a company providing mobile voice and data service.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I believe that my money can be better served by upcoming entrepreneurs than by a simple cash donation
lender.occupational_info: I do eye examinations in order to 1)prescribe glasses and contact lenses for patients and 2) to detect any eye disease and arrange treatment for that disease

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: It is important to help people who are trying to improve themselves. I know that my loan is making a small business become stronger.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office as a senior accountant.

lender.name: rodney
lender.loan_because: I want my children (and I) to be more aware of not only the power of small steps but also the global community.

lender.name: Manfred
lender.loan_because: It is gratifying on a more personable level (with fellow neighbors in the global village) to assist individual entrepreneurs to be successful. For me it's about lending a fishing pole rather than giving the fish for making a more meaningful difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I lead an engineering team in the design of ultrasound imaging machines for Philips Healthcare.

lender.name: Shalom
lender.loan_because: \"Justice, Justice you shall pursue!\"

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to see how wealth can be used productively.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of children with heart problems.

lender.name: Andy and Marta
lender.loan_because: Marta\'s Blog: www.martasmusings.blogspot.com

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I have worked hard and have been fortunate enough to be successful so far. I would like to give others the same opportunity for success.
lender.occupational_info: I study the molecules that regulate the blood vessels in your body.

lender.name: Gary and Laurel
lender.loan_because: No matter how difficult my situation is, I can always find comfort in helping people who are trying their best to provide basic needs for themself and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy what I do, and encourage people to find that makes them happy.

lender.name: dan
lender.loan_because: a little goes a long way in Kivaland.
lender.occupational_info: Taking action to insure some positive legacy of my existence on this planet.

lender.name: Elyse
lender.loan_because: I\'m so grateful that a small donation of mine can help someone across the world help themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I study Industrial/Organizational psychology, mostly working on motivation, commitment, and stress in the workplace.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: Tuna likes good karma.

lender.name: Wouter
lender.loan_because: It takes amazingly little to get enterpreneurs in the third world going. Allowing people to take charge of their own destiny by creating businesses is the surest way to a world that will be able to embrace peace.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I believe in people helping each other. I have a good life and I like to be part of helping others do what they want in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a math and science teacher and I love teaching, but I am working in transportation at the present. I own and drive a transport truck.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: ripples are sustainable
lender.occupational_info: i try to help people stay healthy and treat their illnesses

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: its going to make the world a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I do research to try to help cure diseases.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I believe small business positively changes our world. If I can inspire/assist entrepreneurs to aspire to build their business and get economic traction, then I am applying my positive action and will be a satisfied contributor.

lender.name: iain, stacey & oscar
lender.loan_because: to create a better world for everyone.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: edward cordner
lender.loan_because: I wood like to encourage small enterprise so that they can be more independant
lender.occupational_info: former secondary school teacher of business subjects and scale model truck and train builder

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in this world, however small it may be.
lender.occupational_info: I am a second year MBA student at the Rady School of Management at UC San Diego.

lender.name: Karen and Kip
lender.loan_because: People need to cut out the intervention of huge corporations and get back to grassroot movements in order to empower each other more.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I feel it is my duty to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I design things on a computer, to help other people try to cure cancer.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I have had good luck in my life. As for money, I have some to share, and many borrowers can probably get more benefit and use it more wisely than I can.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I have two children who are now young adults. Most of my engineering work has been designing medical equipment, such as cardiographs which can be used to measure electrical signals produced by the heart. Now I do some of that work, but I am also a student taking classes related to biology, chemistry, and renewable energy.

lender.name: Md.saydul
lender.occupation: want to do business but no fund

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Its fun.
lender.occupational_info: I Dispense medication ordered by Doctors.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: This might seem silly, but I happened to watch the movie \"Hotel Rwanda\" on Christmas Eve. I was profoundly moved by the situation that the people endure. I will do my best to help as much as I can.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Michael C. Hill
lender.occupational_info: I teach American Literature.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Just a way to become involved in something I believe in.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is time to climb the social ladder, not that kind of social ladder, the social ladder that elevates everyone to a new level of Global Social Responsibility. We are all in this together, so it is time to say \"here, I can help.\" As a father of two young ones, it is also a great opportunity to show them that there are plenty of hard working people out in the world that sometimes just need a little nudge to get the ball rolling and make their dreams come true. Hopefully, this will help inspire them to one day help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and new technology.

lender.name: GREGORY
lender.loan_because: I care and Jehovah has blessed me!
lender.occupational_info: seeking first the Kingdom of God

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe in small businesses!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I believe that acts of kindness can help this troubled world...
